source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact)
- **New Data:** where a Pers_No in the source does not exist as an EmployeeNumber in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Pers_No in source and EmployeeNumber in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeNumber in the target exists but the same Pers_No doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View checkmark_casemarking_fact_new is created

%%sql  

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW checkmark_casemarking_fact_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of CaseReference and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN T5.CasemarkingFactID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS CasemarkingFactID, -- surrogate 
    T1.CasemarkingDimID             AS CasemarkingDimID,
    T1.InvalidNullity               AS InvalidNullityReferenceID,
    T1.StructureReasoningDetail     AS StructureReasoningReferenceID,
    T1.Complexity                   AS ComplexityReferenceID,
    T1.PresentationAccuracyDetail   AS PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
    T1.Outcome                      AS OutcomeReferenceID,
    T1.GroundAIITLevel              AS GroundsReferenceID,
    T1.ConditionsDetail             AS ConditionsReferenceID,
    T1.CoverageDetail               AS CoverageReferenceID ,
    T1.CaseReference                AS CaseReference, 
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.IngestionDate)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.CasemarkingDimID,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.CaseReference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.InvalidNullity ,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.StructureReasoningDetail,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Complexity,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.PresentationAccuracyDetail,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Outcome,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.GroundAIITLevel,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.ConditionsDetail,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.CoverageDetail,'.')
        )
    )                               AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T1.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description 
        AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact T5 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T5.CaseReference 
        AND T1.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_invalid_nullity_reference_dim TINV 
    ON TINV.InvalidNullityReferenceID = T5.InvalidNullityReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_structure_reasoning_detail_reference_dim TSRRD 
    ON TSRRD.StructureReasoningDetailReferenceID = T5.StructureReasoningReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_complexity_reference_dim TCOMP 
    ON TCOMP.ComplexityReferenceID = T5.ComplexityReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_presentation_accuracy_detail_reference_dim TPADR 
    ON TPADR.PresentationAccuracyDetailReferenceID = T5.PresentationAccuracyReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_outcome_reference_dim TOR 
    ON TOR.OutcomeReferenceID = T5.OutcomeReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_grounds_reference_dim TGR 
    ON TGR.GroundsReferenceID = T5.GroundsReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_conditions_reference_dim TCON 
    ON TCON.ConditionsReferenceID = T5.ConditionsReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_coverage_reference_dim TCOV 
    ON TCOV.CoverageReferenceID = T5.CoverageReferenceID 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference = T5.CaseReference 
            AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T1.CasemarkingDimID,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.CaseReference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.InvalidNullity ,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.StructureReasoningDetail,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Complexity,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.PresentationAccuracyDetail,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Outcome,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.GroundAIITLevel,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.ConditionsDetail,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.CoverageDetail,'.'))) <> T5.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T5.CaseReference IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.CaseReference IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.IngestionDate = (SELECT MAX(IngestionDate) FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **checkmark_casemarking_fact_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View checkmark_casemarking_fact_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW checkmark_casemarking_fact_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    CasemarkingFactID, -- surrogate 
    CasemarkingDimID,
    InvalidNullityReferenceID,
    StructureReasoningReferenceID,
    ComplexityReferenceID,
    PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    GroundsReferenceID,
    ConditionsReferenceID,
    CoverageReferenceID ,
    CaseReference, -- source system id
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From checkmark_casemarking_fact_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    CasemarkingFactID,
    CasemarkingDimID,
    InvalidNullityReferenceID,
    StructureReasoningReferenceID,
    ComplexityReferenceID,
    PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    GroundsReferenceID,
    ConditionsReferenceID,
    CoverageReferenceID ,
    CaseReference, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM checkmark_casemarking_fact_new WHERE CasemarkingFactID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM checkmark_casemarking_fact_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW checkmark_casemarking_fact_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    CasemarkingFactID,
    CasemarkingDimID,
    InvalidNullityReferenceID,
    StructureReasoningReferenceID,
    ComplexityReferenceID,
    PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    GroundsReferenceID,
    ConditionsReferenceID,
    CoverageReferenceID ,
    CaseReference, 
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM checkmark_casemarking_fact_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View checkmark_casemarking_fact_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table checkmark_casemarking_fact.employee_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact AS Target
USING checkmark_casemarking_fact_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.CasemarkingFactID = Target.CasemarkingFactID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (CasemarkingFactID,
        CasemarkingDimID,
        InvalidNullityReferenceID,
        StructureReasoningReferenceID,
        ComplexityReferenceID,
        PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
        OutcomeReferenceID,
        GroundsReferenceID,
        ConditionsReferenceID,
        CoverageReferenceID ,
        CaseReference,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.CasemarkingFactID,
        Source.CasemarkingDimID,
        Source.InvalidNullityReferenceID,
        Source.StructureReasoningReferenceID,
        Source.ComplexityReferenceID,
        Source.PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
        Source.OutcomeReferenceID,
        Source.GroundsReferenceID,
        Source.ConditionsReferenceID,
        Source.CoverageReferenceID ,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) 
;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.checkmark_casemarking_fact is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new CasemarkingFactID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CasemarkingFactID NULLS LAST) AS CasemarkingFactID, -- surrogate key
    CasemarkingDimID,
    InvalidNullityReferenceID,
    StructureReasoningReferenceID,
    ComplexityReferenceID,
    PresentationAccuracyReferenceID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    GroundsReferenceID,
    ConditionsReferenceID,
    CoverageReferenceID ,
    CaseReference, -- source system id
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact;
